a5398f0d-e749-47b2-a7b4-6defc7bdda2f.description: This volunteering certificate is rewarded to Cambridge University ReachSci Society volunteers after volunteering for 5 hours a week over a year. The volunteer was part of impactful and global projects and has achieved high-quality work and shown great commitment. Gold volunteers develop and practice professional skills throughout volunteering, including time management, communication, leadership, creative thinking, teamwork, project designing and execution, among many others.
a5398f0d-e749-47b2-a7b4-6defc7bdda2f.name: ReachSci Gold Volunteer

badge_template_activities.title: The volunteer achieved the following to qualify for this badge: 1) Achieved very high-quality work; 2) Attended all meetings, except a few for a very reasonable excuse; 3) Met all deadlines; 4) Made significant progress in their role by giving suggestions and implementing them; 5) Was very responsive and professional; 6) Worked at least 5 hours a week, weekly, for at least a year; 7) Made big achievement/s to ReachSci that they are very proud of; 8) Achieved significant personal development.

2cf09d4c-c908-49eb-bda2-bcec6ec4b411.description: This volunteering certificate is rewarded to Cambridge University ReachSci Society volunteers after volunteering for 5 hours a week over a year. The volunteer was part of impactful and global projects and has achieved high-quality work and shown great commitment. Silver volunteers achieve high-quality work and help develop ReachSci during their volunteering with us.
2cf09d4c-c908-49eb-bda2-bcec6ec4b411.name: ReachSci Silver Volunteer

badge_template_activities.title: The volunteer achieved the following to qualify for this badge: 1) Achieved high-quality work; 2) Attended all meetings, except a few for a very reasonable excuse; 3) Made significant progress in their role by giving suggestions and implementing them; 4) Worked at least 5 hours a week, weekly, for at least a year.
